info.official_title: A Prospective, Multicenter, Randomized, Controlled Phase III Study Evaluating Different Cycles of Oxaliplatin Combined With S-1 (SOX) as Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy for Patients With Locally Advanced Gastric Cancer: RESONANCE-II Trial

identified_line.line: 1. Non-bedridden, aged 18 to 70 years old;
2. Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) score is 0 to 1;

criterions.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) score is 0 to 1

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) score is 0 to 1

identified_line.line: 3. Histologically confirmed gastric adenocarcinoma;
5. The research center and the surgeon have the ability to complete standard D2 radical gastrectomy, and the gastrectomy can be tolerated by the patient;

criterions.exact_snippets: research center and the surgeon have the ability to complete standard D2 radical gastrectomy
gastrectomy can be tolerated by the patient

and_criteria.exact_snippets: research center and the surgeon have the ability to complete standard D2 radical gastrectomy
gastrectomy can be tolerated by the patient

identified_line.line: 6. Laboratory test criteria: peripheral blood hemoglobin (Hb) ≥ 90 g/L, neutrophil absolute count ≥ 3×109 /L, platelet count (PLT) ≥ 100×109 /L, alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and aspartate aminotransferase (AST) ≤ 2.5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN), total bilirubin ≤ 1.5×ULN, serum creatinine (SCr) ≤ 1.5×ULN, and serum albumin (ALB) ≥ 30 g/L;

criterions.exact_snippets: alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and aspartate aminotransferase (AST) ≤ 2.5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and aspartate aminotransferase (AST) ≤ 2.5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN)

identified_line.line: 7. Patients with heart disease, the echocardiogram showed that the left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50%, the electrocardiogram (ECG) is basically normal within 4 weeks before operation and without no obvious symptoms are acceptable;

criterions.exact_snippets: echocardiogram showed that the left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50%
electrocardiogram (ECG) is basically normal within 4 weeks before operation

and_criteria.exact_snippets: echocardiogram showed that the left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50%
electrocardiogram (ECG) is basically normal within 4 weeks before operation

identified_line.line: 8. There is no serious underlying disease that could lead to an expected life expectancy < 5 years;
9. Willing to sign the inform consent for participation and publication of results.

criterions.exact_snippets: Willing to sign the inform consent for participation
Willing to sign the inform consent for ... publication of results.
criterions.criterion: informed consent for publication of results

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Willing to sign the inform consent for participation
Willing to sign the inform consent for ... publication of results.
and_criteria.criterion: informed consent for publication of results

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
1. Pregnant or lactating women;
2. Positive pregnancy test for women in childbearing age. Menopausal women without menstruation for at least 12 months can be regarded as women with no possibility of getting pregnant;

criterions.exact_snippets: Positive pregnancy test for women in childbearing age
Menopausal women without menstruation for at least 12 months

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Positive pregnancy test for women in childbearing age

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Menopausal women without menstruation for at least 12 months

identified_line.line: 3. Refuse to birth control during the study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Refuse to birth control during the study

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Refuse to birth control during the study

identified_line.line: 4. Received any chemotherapy, radiotherapy or immunotherapy before;
5. History of other malignant diseases in the last five years (except for cervical carcinoma in situ);

criterions.exact_snippets: History of other malignant diseases in the last five years
except for cervical carcinoma in situ

and_criteria.exact_snippets: History of other malignant diseases in the last five years

not_criteria.exact_snippets: except for cervical carcinoma in situ

identified_line.line: 6. History of uncontrolled central nervous system diseases, which could influence the compliance;
8. History of dysphagia, complete or partial gastrointestinal obstruction, active gastrointestinal bleeding and gastrointestinal perforation;
9. On steroid treatment after organ transplant;
10. With uncontrolled severe infections;
11. Known dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase deficiency (DPD);
12. Anaphylaxis to any research drug ingredient;

criterions.exact_snippets: Anaphylaxis to any research drug ingredient

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Anaphylaxis to any research drug ingredient

identified_line.line: 13. Known peripheral neuropathy (> NCI-CTC AE 1). Patients with only disappearance of deep tendon reflex need not to be excluded.

4. Stage III (American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) TNM staging system 8th edition) gastric cancer confirmed by enhanced computer tomography (enhanced CT) and laparoscopic exploration (endoscopic ultrasonography (EUS) and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) if necessary);

criterions.exact_snippets: Stage III (American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) TNM staging system 8th edition) gastric cancer
Stage III (American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) TNM staging system 8th edition) gastric cancer

requirement.expected_value: American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) TNM staging system 8th edition

criterions.exact_snippets: confirmed by enhanced computer tomography (enhanced CT)
(endoscopic ultrasonography (EUS) and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) if necessary)

identified_line.line: 7. History of severe liver diseases, renal diseases or respiratory diseases; Uncontrolled diabetes and hypertension; Clinically severe heart disease, such as congestive heart failure, symptomatic coronary heart disease, uncontrolled arrhythmia, or a history of myocardial infarction in the last six months;

criterions.exact_snippets: history of myocardial infarction in the last six months
history of myocardial infarction in the last six months
